department.ch: 應用地質研究所碩士班

goal.en: Learning the knowledge of coupled solid and fluid interactive theory and its applications
goal.ch: 習得土水耦合力學之理論與應用知識

content.en:
1. Introduction
2. Applications of Poroelasticity
3. Hydrogeological Concepts
4. Groundwater Flow
5. Soil Deformation
6. Linear Constitutive Equations
7. Governing Equations
8. Initial and Boundary Conditions
9. Land Subsidence Simulations
10. Thermal-Hydraulic-Mechanical Model
11. Numerical Methods
12. Case Study
content.ch:
1. 簡介
2. 孔彈性理論之應用範疇
3. 水文地質概念
4. 地下水流理論
5. 土體變形理論
6. 線性本構方程式
7. 控制方程式
8. 初始與邊界條件
9. 地層下陷模擬
10. 熱-水-力模式
11. 數值方法
12. 案例研究

textbook.en: Text: Alexander H.- D. Cheng, 2016, Poroelasticity, Springer International Publishing. (eBook in NCU library) Reference: Herbert F. Wang, 2001, Theory of Linear Poroelasticity with Applications to Geomechanics and Hydrogeology, Princeton University Press. Arnold Verruijt, 2014, Theory and Problem of Poroelasticity, Delft University of Technology. (eBook on the website)
textbook.ch: Text: Alexander H.- D. Cheng, 2016, Poroelasticity, Springer International Publishing. (eBook in NCU library) Reference: Herbert F. Wang, 2001, Theory of Linear Poroelasticity with Applications to Geomechanics and Hydrogeology, Princeton University Press. Arnold Verruijt, 2014, Theory and Problem of Poroelasticity, Delft University of Technology. (eBook on the website)

method.ch: 講授 研討 其他

grading.ch: 出席與課堂表現 40％ 報告與作業 40％ 期中考 20％

flex_desc.en: Field trip and online reference review
flex_desc.ch: 現地調查與勘察、線上文獻參閱

en.Assessments: Test/Exam ， Assignments ， Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Attendance/Performance
